moves.7... Qc7 8. e4 dxe4 9. Nxe4 Nxe4 10. Rxe: Very active variation. Maybe sharp, too.
moves.11... Nd7 12. Ng5 Nf6 13. Bc4 Re8 14. Nx: Otherwise I win back the rook with Qh5
moves.16. Qh5 Qxh5 17. Rxh5: One pawn more and an opened black king. White have the winning position.
moves.17... a5 18. a3 b5 19. Ba2 Kf7 20. Rxf5+: This happens, when I have no good day. The war is over, white can go home with resign...
moves.27... Kxg5 28. Bxg7 e3 29. Bd4 e2 30. Re: I have 3 (maybe pawns against 2 bishops - no way.
